item.title: CVE-2024-29143|2024-03-19T13:12:45.969Z -- cozmoslabs%2C%20sareiodata -- passwordless%20login
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Cozmoslabs, sareiodata Passwordless Login passwordless-login allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Passwordless Login: from n/a through 1.1.2.
